Package com.iontrading.mkv.helper

Class MkvSupplyUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iontrading.mkv.helper.MkvSupplyUtils
  • @Keep
@KeepPublicClassMemberNames
public class MkvSupplyUtils
extends Object
    This class provides utility methods for handling MkvSupply objects.

      • getString

        public static final String getString​(CharSequence value)
        Creates a new String so that it represents the sequence of characters currently contained in the character sequence argument.

        When the specified CharSequence is backed by a StringBuffer, the CharSequence.toString() returns a String that, in some cases, could not be deallocated by garbace collector even if not longer used; this method instead returns a string which does not suffer of this problem.

        Parameters:
        value - the initial value of the string.
        Returns:
        a new String so that it represents the sequence of characters currently contained in the character sequence argument.

      • getStringBuffer

        public static final StringBuffer getStringBuffer​(CharSequence value)
        Creates a new StringBuffer so that it represents the sequence of characters currently contained in the character sequence argument.
        Parameters:
        value - the initial value of the string buffer.
        Returns:
        a new StringBuffer so that it represents the sequence of characters currently contained in the character sequence argument.

      • setMkvDate

        public static final void setMkvDate​(Date ddate,
                                    int sdate)
        Stores the date specified as an integer in ION Bus format on the specified Date object.

        The time part of the specified object is left unchanged.

        Parameters:
        ddate - the Date object where to store the date.
        sdate - the integer representing the date to store.

      • setMkvDate

        public static final void setMkvDate​(Calendar ddate,
                                    int sdate)
        Stores the date specified as an integer in ION Bus format on the specified Calendar object.

        The time part of the specified object is left unchanged.

        Parameters:
        ddate - the Calendar object where to store the date.
        sdate - the integer representing the date to store.

      • setMkvTime

        public static final void setMkvTime​(Date dtime,
                                    int stime)
        Stores the time specified as an integer in ION Bus format on the specified Date object.

        The date part of the specified object is left unchanged, millisecond part is set to 0.

        Parameters:
        dtime - the Date object where to store the time.
        stime - the integer representing the time to store.

      • setMkvTime

        public static final void setMkvTime​(Calendar dtime,
                                    int stime)
        Stores the time specified as an integer in ION Bus format on the specified Calendar object.

        The date part of the specified object is left unchanged, millisecond part is set to 0.

        Parameters:
        dtime - the Calendar object where to store the time.
        stime - the integer representing the time to store.

      • setMkvTimestamp

        public static final void setMkvTimestamp​(Date dtime,
                                         int stime)
        Stores the timestamp specified as an integer in ION Bus format on the specified Date object.

        The date part of the specified object is left unchanged, millisecond part is set to 0.

        Parameters:
        dtime - the Date object where to store the time.
        stime - the integer representing the timestamp to store.

      • setMkvTimestamp

        public static final void setMkvTimestamp​(Calendar dtime,
                                         int stime)
        Stores the timestamp specified as an integer in ION Bus format on the specified Calendar object.

        The date part of the specified object is left unchanged, millisecond part is set to 0.

        Parameters:
        dtime - the Calendar object where to store the time.
        stime - the integer representing the timestamp to store.

      • toString

        public static final String toString​(MkvSupply supply)
        Returns a string representation of the supply in the form of a set of entries, enclosed in braces and separated by the ASCII characters ", " (comma and space). Each entry is rendered as the field number, an equals sign =, and the field value.
        Parameters:
        supply - a MkvSupply object.
        Returns:
        a string representation of the supply.

      • toString

        public static final String toString​(MkvSupply supply,
                                    MkvType type)
        Returns a string representation of the first argument in the form of a set of entries, enclosed in braces and separated by the ASCII characters ", " (comma and space). Each entry is rendered as the field name, an equals sign =, and the field value.
        Parameters:
        supply - a MkvSupply object.
        type - a MkvType object.
        Returns:
        a string representation of the fisrt argument.
